mapper.sql: cid, cname, cproterty, cstate, caccount, cemail, cphone, caddress, bremark, smid
mapper.insert: insert into customer (cid, cname, cproterty, cstate, caccount, cemail, cphone, caddress, bremark, smid) values (#{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cproterty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update customer
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cproterty = #{cproterty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cstate = #{cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
caccount = #{caccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cemail = #{cemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cphone = #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
caddress = #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bremark = #{bremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smid = #{smid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update customer set cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cproterty = #{cproterty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cstate = #{cstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caccount = #{caccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cemail = #{cemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cphone = #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caddress = #{caddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bremark = #{bremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smid = #{smid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
